description: It is the first death of a person with Covid-19 to be announced on the island since 4 May.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man death toll rises to 24
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man death toll rises to 24 - BBC News
maintext: Twenty of the 24 deaths on the island have been linked to the nursing home in Ballasalla, which had its licence suspended in April.
